abstract: Facing a grave liquidity crisis, Bear Stearns reached out for a financial lifeline and now faces the prospect of the end of its 85-year run as an independent investment bank.
snippet: Facing a grave liquidity crisis, Bear Stearns reached out for a financial lifeline and now faces the prospect of the end of its 85-year run as an independent investment bank.
lead_paragraph: Bear Stearns, facing a grave liquidity crisis, reached out to JPMorgan on Friday for a short-term financial lifeline and now faces the prospect of the end of its 85-year run as an independent investment bank.

headline.main: JPMorgan and Fed Move to Bail Out Bear Stearns

abstract: Duration Capital, one of several hedge funds forced to sell hundreds of millions of dollars of municipal bonds when their bets went awry, is severing its links with its main prime broker, JPMorgan Chase, according to Reuters.
lead_paragraph: Duration Capital, one of several hedge funds forced to sell hundreds of millions of dollars of municipal bonds when their bets went awry, is severing its links with its main prime broker, JPMorgan Chase, according to Reuters.

headline.main: Duration Capital Said to Cut All Ties With JPMorgan
